name: Galaxy Shooter Beta
description:
*Work In Progress
Creating for Study.

Galaxy Shooter is a beta game used for study principles and modes of create games, based in games 2d with aeroship in galaxy.

The game is building in portuguese, but contains texts and  functionalities in English.

If you interesing about how to play is easy:
Single Player Mode:

  • UP = W
  • Down = S
  • Left = A
  • Right = D
  • Shoot = SpaceBar or Left Ctrl
  • Pause = P
  • TripleShot = Enabled triple shot
  • Shield = Enabled Shield, if you  dont have 3 lifes and get 2 shields in sequence, you enabled 1 more life;
  • Speed = Enabled velocity boost

Multiplayer Mode:

  • UP = UP Arrow
  • Down = Down Arrow
  • Left = Left Arrow
  • Right = Right Arrow
  • Shoot = Enter or Right Ctrl
  • Pause = P
  • TripleShot = Enabled triple shot
  • Shield = Enabled Shield, if you  dont have 3 lifes and get 2 shields in sequence, you enabled 1 more life;
  • Speed = Enabled velocity boost

Is basic, but this is my first game.
